DOC.brief_summary: Study Objectives : 1 . The primary objective characterize pharmacokinetics single oral administration 50 mg Cambia pediatric subject , age 12-17 year diagnosis episodic migraine without aura . 2 . The secondary objective determine : 1 . The safety tolerability Cambia single dose 2 . Three-month safety evaluation Cambia outpatient usage population
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetics & Safety Cambia® Migraine With Without Aura 12-17 Year Olds
